channel.title: Comments on: RBTR new cover and more news

item.title: By: Steve Owen
item.dc:creator: Steve Owen
item.description:
Thanks for the info. I'm looking forward to receiving my copies in due course. Gary Crampton's book is excellent and, I should have thought, unanswerable.
Blessings,
Steve Owen
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the info. I’m looking forward to receiving my copies in due course.
Gary Crampton’s book is excellent and, I should have thought, unanswerable.

Blessings,

Steve Owen
